review_question: Does this action reveal reality as it is or does it obscure or distort to serve convenience?
Does this decision flow from genuine care for all affected beings or from self-interest alone?
Does this preserve the freedom and autonomy of every party or create dependency and control?
Does this honor the sacred traditions and ancestral wisdom from which it draws?
Does this strengthen the bonds between diverse communities or deepen division?
Does this move all parties toward growth and greater capacity or does it entrench stagnation?
Does this extend mercy and compassion even where strictness might be justified?
